page.title: 18GERRARD STREET INTERVIEWS
page.content:
A group of children delivered a questionnaire to the residents of Gerrard Street, which is very near to the motorway. The following day they returned and asked the residents the following questions:
1) Were you here when the motorway was built, and if so, how inconvenient was it ?
2) Do you like living near the motorway; what do you see as the advantages and disadvantages ?
3) Do you have to take any special precautions with children or pets ?
A brief synopsis of the transcribed tape is on the following page....
